property.name: text
property.value: This famous ABRO SyncCharts example, taken from "Semantics of SyncCharts" of Charles André, illustrates concurrency, hierarchy, normal termination and strong or weak aborts. Though not everything is natively supported by the modal model concept of Ptolemy (like conruccency or normal termination) it illustrates patterns to accomplish these lacks.

property.name: text
property.value: This test triggered a weird bug reported by Christian Motika where the symptom was that having a spurious output port in a modal model could trigger an exception (monotonicity violation). The bug was that sendClear() was being prematurely executed even when inputs were unknown.

entity.name: Ramp
entity.doc: Create a sequence of tokens with increasing value
